mainText:
Steve Jobs,
He will be my icon, forever. He should inspire every Man on this Earth, 
to bring the Human being technology and creativity, spilling happiness, 
thus. He just changed my way to see the world and to live my life, he 
was the greatest man that has ever lived.
Rest in peace, Steve, and thank you for everything you've created.
header: Remembering the men that created a new world..
author: Quentin
